com.esri.mo2.file.shp
Class ShapefileFolder

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.map.dpy.BaseLayerSource
        |
        +--com.esri.mo2.map.dpy.BaseWorkspaceLayerSource
              |
              +--com.esri.mo2.file.shp.ShapefileFolder
All Implemented Interfaces:
LayerSource, WorkspaceLayerSource
Deprecated. - the interface has been deprecated, see Content API.

public class ShapefileFolder
extends BaseWorkspaceLayerSource

This class is used by MapObjects to process a system directory that contains files having the standard ESRI shapefile format. It is designed to connect the MapObjects feature model with the API that reads and writes shapefiles.
